title: Trace Ethylene Carbonate Mediated Low-Concentration Ether-based Electrolytes for High-Voltage Lithium Metal Batteries
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01831A, Paper
Yinghua Chen, Zheng Ma, Yuqi Wang, Pushpendra Kumar, Fei Zhao, Tao Cai, Zhen Cao, Luigi Cavallo, Haoran Cheng, Qian Li, Jun Ming
Ether-based electrolytes have been extensively utilized in lithium metal batteries due to their superior compatibility with lithium metal. Nevertheless, the inferior high-voltage oxidation stability (> 4.0 V) hampers their practical...
